rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;7e684126.1502">   <title>BOLDE update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;7e684126.1502</link>   <description> To all BOLDE research bank users<br><br>258 new records have just been added to the Blended, Online Learning and Distance Education research bank.<br><br>http://opac.acer.edu.au/drde/index.html<br><br>Under New additions, find April-December 2014 additions<br><br>Please note that only Australian material is currently being added to BOLDE.<br><br>Regards<br>Barbara Spiller   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-22T22:48:43+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Spiller, Barbara</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;7e684126.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;fd798501.1502">   <title>CFP - 2nd International Conference on e-Learning e-Education and Online Training </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;fd798501.1502</link>   <description> 2nd International Conference on e-Learning e-Education and Online Training<br>16-18 September, 2015 - Novedrate (Como), Italy<br>http://eleot.org/<br><br>Scope<br>eLEOT 2015 will focus on e-learning initiatives related to STEM disciplines. We are looking for contributions that range from innovative ways to present information, to mobile-based interactive technologies simulating experiments, to methodologies to manage and study student performance from the back-end, and many more topics. We will also feature space for demonstrations and interactive sessions. More at http://eleot.org/. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-09T15:58:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Giovanni Vincenti</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;fd798501.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;d016dec8.1412">   <title>New Distance Learning Opportunities in Teaching and Learning at QMUL </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;d016dec8.1412</link>   <description> New Distance Learning Offering at QMUL<br><br>View this email in your browser&lt;http://us7.campaign-archive2.com/?u=3dfa1780ce9b222493c94a5b7&amp;id=152e2fe439&amp;e=&gt;<br><br>[http://gallery.mailchimp.com/27aac8a65e64c994c4416d6b8/images/icon_envelope.png]<br><br>[https://gallery.mailchimp.com/3dfa1780ce9b222493c94a5b7/images/CAPD_full_blue_out13e041.jpg]<br><br>Online CPD Opportunities in Teaching and Learning<br><br>QMUL is pleased to announce that a new Distance Learning Programme from the Centre for Academic and Professional Development (CAPD) will be starting in January 2015<br><br>The Distance Learning Programme&lt;http://capd.qmul.ac.uk/what-we-offer/educational-development/distance-learning-2/&gt; is now taking applications for standalone modules as well as for the Certificate in Learning and Teaching (CILT) and Postgraduate Certificate in Academic Practice (PGCAP). Completion of CILT or PGCAP will enable participants to gain recognition as Associate and Fellow (respectively) of the Higher Education Academy. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-08T11:40:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>[Shared] CAPD ADP DL</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;d016dec8.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;b1327a0e.1411">   <title>New Distance Learning Opportunities in Teaching and Learning at QMUL </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;b1327a0e.1411</link>   <description> New Distance Learning Offering at QMUL<br><br>View this email in your browser&lt;http://us7.campaign-archive2.com/?u=3dfa1780ce9b222493c94a5b7&amp;id=152e2fe439&amp;e=&gt;<br><br>[http://gallery.mailchimp.com/27aac8a65e64c994c4416d6b8/images/icon_envelope.png]<br><br>[https://gallery.mailchimp.com/3dfa1780ce9b222493c94a5b7/images/CAPD_full_blue_out13e041.jpg]<br><br>Online CPD Opportunities in Teaching and Learning<br><br>QMUL is pleased to announce that a new Distance Learning Programme from the Centre for Academic and Professional Development (CAPD) will be starting in January 2015<br><br>The Distance Learning Programme&lt;http://capd.qmul.ac.uk/what-we-offer/educational-development/distance-learning-2/&gt; is now taking applications for standalone modules as well as for the Certificate in Learning and Teaching (CILT) and Postgraduate Certificate in Academic Practice (PGCAP). Completion of CILT or PGCAP will enable participants to gain recognition as Associate and Fellow (respectively) of the Higher Education Academy. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-19T12:56:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Stephanie Fuller</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;b1327a0e.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;c70b3ed5.1411">   <title>Conference Beliefs and Behaviour in Education and Culture, Timisoara, Romania </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;c70b3ed5.1411</link>   <description> Dear Colleague,<br><br>The Teacher Training Department, West University of Timi\ufffd\ufffdoara (Romania), is<br>pleased to announce the International Conference *Beliefs and Behaviours in<br>Education and Culture*, which will be held in June 25 - 27, 2015.<br>The aim of the conference, proposing interdisciplinary perspectives, is to<br>build comprehensive and holistic explanations of beliefs from different<br>sciences that have a great impact upon education and culture. The<br>conference addresses themes related to issues and processes of education at<br>any level, from kindergarten to lifelong learning, from formal to informal<br>education.<br>We propose topics of debate, such as but not limited to:<br>* [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-13T03:28:55+03:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Narcisa nadolu</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;c70b3ed5.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;5feea4db.1411">   <title>CfP: Gender and Education: Critical Issues, Policy and Practice 28-30 May 2015, Bloomington, IN, United States </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;5feea4db.1411</link>   <description> International Conference on<br>Gender and Education<br>Critical Issues, Policy and Practice<br>28-30 May 2015, Bloomington, IN, United States<br><br>Organising Institutions:<br>Gender Studies Platform, London Centre for Social Studies (LCSS)<br>School of Education, Indiana University-Bloomington<br>Centre for Gender in Global Context (GENCEN), Michigan State University<br>Department of Law, Gediz University<br><br>Call for Proposals<br>Deadline for Abstract Submissions: Wednesday, 10th December 2014<br>The International Conference on Gender and Education aims to engage researchers,<br>academics and policy makers in discussions and debates concerning the interplay<br>between gender related issues and educational dynamics. This conference will<br>explore the consequences and reflections of hierarchical structures [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-07T09:52:05+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Gender and Education</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;5feea4db.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;d71ccf5b.1406">   <title>BOLDE update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;d71ccf5b.1406</link>   <description> To all BOLDE research bank users<br><br>This is to let you know that work on The Blended Online Learning and Distance Education (BOLDE) research bank will cease as from 1st July 2014, until new sponsorship is found.<br><br>No new material will be added to the research bank and the Twitter feed will remain dormant. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-17T06:31:36+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Spiller, Barbara</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;d71ccf5b.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;c1f82b28.1405">   <title>BOLDE research bank update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;c1f82b28.1405</link>   <description> To all BOLDE research bank users<br><br>125 new records have just been added to the Blended, Online Learning and Distance Education research bank.<br><br>Click on January-March 2014 additions to see new records<br><br>http://opac.acer.edu.au:8080/drde/index.html<br><br>Regards<br>Barbara Spiller   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-06T05:28:41+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Spiller, Barbara</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDUSHARE;c1f82b28.1405</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
